official_title: To amend title V of the Act of December 19, 1980, designating the Chaco Culture Archaeological Protection Sites, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Chacoan Outliers Protection Act of 1990 - Adds specified Navajo archeological protection sites to the Chaco Culture National Historical Park, New Mexico. Adds the southwestern Colorado area to the Masau Trail route linking prehistoric and cultural sites in New Mexico and eastern Arizona.

titles.title: To amend title V of the Act of December 19, 1980, designating the Chaco Culture Archaeological Protection Sites, and for other purposes.
